name: Healthcare Review Master
author: iCanWP Team, Sean Roh, Chris Couweleers

sections.description:
Healthcare Review Master is the quickest and easiest way to pull reviews right off your Zocdoc page and directly onto your personal WordPress website. It’s equipped with a modern responsive design so you can proudly show off your Zocdoc reviews on any device. Also enjoy easy customization within the settings panel so you can make it work the way you want.

Uninstall

  • All saved options will be deleted from the database. Use disable plugin if you are going to use the plugin again.

Support

  • This plugin is provided as is without any warranty.
  • All supports maybe available voluntarily by the development team.
  • Any suggestions, complaints, support requests are happily accepted via email at support@icanwp.com

Limitation

  • No limitations at this time.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload ‘healthcare-review-master’ directory to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Press “Add New Portfolio” to create a single portfolio box and attach a featured image.
  4. Copy and paste the shortcode [show-reviews] in the content area of any page or post.

For additional information please visit our website
https://icanwp.com/plugins/healthcare-review-master/
sections.faq:
1. Can I choose how many reviews to show at one time?
    Yes.

  2. Is it responsive?
    Yes.

  3. Does it work on mobile setting?
    Yes.

  4. Do I have control over the transition speed?
    Yes.

  5. Can I show/hide the manual control for loaded reviews?
    Yes.

  6. Is this slider compatible with other major plugins?
    Yes, this the Portfolio Gallery Master is compatible with the following major plugins:

* WooCommerce
* Gravity Forms
* WPTouch Pro
* Jetpack
* Many more

short_description: Creates a verticle sliding list of healthcare reviews.
